meanings.definition: To surpass in guessing or predicting.
meanings.sent1: She always outguesses me when we play guessing games.
meanings.sent2: He outguesses his opponents by studying their strategies.
meanings.sent3: The detective outguesses the criminal and solves the case.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition outguesses any logical reasoning.
meanings.sent5: Outguesses like hers are rare and impressive.

meanings.definition: To outwit or outsmart by guessing correctly.
meanings.sent1: He outguesses his friends in riddles every time.
meanings.sent2: She outguesses the quiz show contestants with ease.
meanings.sent3: The cat outguesses the mouse and catches it every time.
meanings.sent4: His clever strategy outguesses his opponent's moves.
meanings.sent5: Outguesses in games require both skill and luck.
